text: Rangri also knowis a dialect of Haryanvi dialect of Panjabi,spoken in Pakistan, primarily by muslim Ranghars in Punjab province as well as Karachi and Mirpur Khas in Sindh.https://kjlr.pk/index.php/kjlr/article/download/148/86 == References == Category:Punjabi language
title: Rangri dialect (Haryanvi)
